Description.Text: The hotel's lobby features glass windows and an impressive metal sculpture. It also features a sumptuous resident?s lounge with fireplace, deep sofas and original art leading onto a spacious leafy courtyard garden. Boasting high ceilings and floor length windows, each guestroom is individually designed using a clever combination of colour and texture, modern and antique furniture and original art. The in-house restaurant is open all day for breakfast, lunch and dinner as well for coffee, cocktails and English afternoon tea.
The hotel is situated on a quiet cobbled street in the heart of New York's vibrant SoHo neighbourhood between Prince and Spring Streets.
